verses.verse: Arise, <WH6965> shine; <WH215> for your light <WH216> is come, <WH935> and the glory <WH3519> of the LORD <WH3068> is risen <WH2224> on you.

For, behold, <WH2009> the darkness <WH2822> shall cover <WH3680> the earth, <WH776> and gross <WH6205> darkness <WH6205> the people: <WH3816> but the LORD <WH3068> shall arise <WH2224> on you, and his glory <WH3519> shall be seen <WH7200> on you.
And the Gentiles <WH1471> shall come <WH1980> to your light, <WH216> and kings <WH4428> to the brightness <WH5051> of your rising. <WH2225>

Lift <WH5375> up your eyes <WH5869> round <WH5439> about, and see: <WH7200> all <WH3605> they gather <WH6908> themselves together, they come <WH935> to you: your sons <WH1121> shall come <WH935> from far, <WH7350> and your daughters <WH1323> shall be nursed <WH539> at <WH5921> your side. <WH6654>

Then <WH227> you shall see, <WH3372> <WH7200> and flow <WH5102> together, and your heart <WH3824> shall fear, <WH6342> and be enlarged; <WH7337> because <WH3588> the abundance <WH1995> of the sea <WH3220> shall be converted <WH2015> to you, the forces <WH2428> of the Gentiles <WH1471> shall come <WH935> to you.

The multitude <WH8229> of camels <WH1581> shall cover <WH3680> you, the dromedaries <WH1070> of Midian <WH4080> and Ephah; <WH5891> all <WH3605> they from Sheba <WH7614> shall come: <WH935> they shall bring <WH5375> gold <WH2091> and incense; <WH3828> and they shall show <WH1319> forth the praises <WH8416> of the LORD. <WH3068>

All <WH3605> the flocks <WH6629> of Kedar <WH6938> shall be gathered <WH6908> together to you, the rams <WH352> of Nebaioth <WH5032> shall minister <WH8334> to you: they shall come <WH5927> up with acceptance <WH7522> on <WH5921> my altar, <WH4196> and I will glorify <WH6286> the house <WH1004> of my glory. <WH8597>
Who <WH4310> are these <WH428> that fly <WH5774> as a cloud, <WH5645> and as the doves <WH3123> to their windows? <WH699>

Surely <WH3588> the isles <WH339> shall wait <WH6960> for me, and the ships <WH591> of Tarshish <WH8659> first, <WH7223> to bring <WH935> your sons <WH1121> from far, <WH7350> their silver <WH3701> and their gold <WH2091> with them, to the name <WH8034> of the LORD <WH3068> your God, <WH430> and to the Holy <WH6918> One of Israel, <WH3478> because <WH3588> he has glorified <WH6286> you.

And the sons <WH1121> of strangers <WH5236> shall build <WH1129> up your walls, <WH2346> and their kings <WH4428> shall minister <WH8334> to you: for in my wrath <WH7110> I smote <WH5221> you, but in my favor <WH7522> have I had mercy <WH7355> on you.

Therefore your gates <WH8179> shall be open <WH6605> continually; <WH8548> they shall not be shut <WH5462> day <WH3119> nor night; <WH3915> that men may bring <WH935> to you the forces <WH2428> of the Gentiles, <WH1471> and that their kings <WH4428> may be brought. <WH5090>
For the nation <WH1471> and kingdom <WH4467> that will not serve <WH5647> you shall perish; <WH6> yes, those nations <WH1471> shall be utterly wasted. <WH2717>

The glory <WH3519> of Lebanon <WH3844> shall come <WH935> to you, the fir <WH1265> tree, the pine <WH8410> tree, and the box <WH8391> together, <WH3162> to beautify <WH6286> the place <WH4725> of my sanctuary; <WH4720> and I will make <WH7760> the place <WH4725> of my feet <WH7272> glorious. <WH3513>

The sons <WH1121> also of them that afflicted <WH6031> you shall come <WH1980> bending <WH7817> to you; and all <WH3605> they that despised <WH5006> you shall bow <WH7812> themselves down <WH7812> at <WH5921> the soles <WH3709> of your feet; <WH7272> and they shall call <WH7121> you; The city <WH5892> of the LORD, <WH3068> The Zion <WH6726> of the Holy <WH6918> One of Israel. <WH3478>

Whereas <WH8478> you has been <WH1961> forsaken <WH5800> and hated, <WH8130> so that no <WH369> man went <WH5674> through <WH5674> you, I will make <WH7760> you an eternal <WH5769> excellency, <WH1347> a joy <WH4885> of many generations. <WH1755>

You shall also suck <WH3243> the milk <WH2461> of the Gentiles, <WH1471> and shall suck <WH3243> the breast <WH7699> of kings: <WH4428> and you shall know <WH3045> that I the LORD <WH3068> am your Savior <WH3467> and your Redeemer, <WH1350> the mighty <WH46> One of Jacob. <WH3290>

For brass <WH5178> I will bring <WH935> gold, <WH2091> and for iron <WH1270> I will bring <WH935> silver, <WH3701> and for wood <WH6086> brass, <WH5178> and for stones <WH68> iron: <WH1270> I will also make <WH7760> your officers <WH6486> peace, <WH7965> and your exactors <WH5065> righteousness. <WH6666>

Violence <WH2555> shall no <WH3808> more <WH5750> be heard <WH8085> in your land, <WH776> wasting <WH7701> nor destruction <WH7667> within your borders; <WH1366> but you shall call <WH7121> your walls <WH2346> Salvation, <WH3444> and your gates <WH8179> Praise. <WH8416>

The sun <WH8121> shall be no <WH3808> more <WH5750> your light <WH216> by day; <WH3119> neither <WH3808> for brightness <WH5051> shall the moon <WH3394> give light <WH216> to you: but the LORD <WH3068> shall be to you an everlasting <WH5769> light, <WH216> and your God <WH430> your glory. <WH8597>

Your sun <WH8121> shall no <WH3808> more <WH5750> go <WH935> down; neither <WH3808> shall your moon <WH3391> withdraw <WH622> itself: for the LORD <WH3068> shall be your everlasting <WH5769> light, <WH216> and the days <WH3117> of your mourning <WH60> shall be ended. <WH7999>

Your people <WH5971> also shall be all <WH3605> righteous: <WH6662> they shall inherit <WH3423> the land <WH776> for ever, <WH5769> the branch <WH5342> of my planting, <WH4302> the work <WH4639> of my hands, <WH3027> that I may be glorified. <WH6286>
A little <WH6996> one shall become <WH1961> a thousand, <WH505> and a small <WH6810> one a strong <WH6099> nation: <WH1471> I the LORD <WH3068> will hasten <WH2363> it in his time. <WH6256>
